cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.GT, cs.MA, cs.LG

The paper deals with the optimization of communication cost in the context of smart grid, which involves the use of probabilistic mechanisms and stochastic models. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of Systems and Control (cs.SY), which deals with the analysis and design of complex systems. Additionally, the paper also involves the use of information theory (cs.IT) to optimize communication cost, as well as game theory (cs.GT) to model the interaction between the power supplier and the consumer. The use of probabilistic models and optimization techniques also suggests that the paper may belong to the sub-categories of Machine Learning (cs.MA) or Learning (cs.LG).
